page.title: 18Sparetime Activities
page.content:
{Kerry Marriott writes:}In Rookley and the countryside around there is a wide range of things to enjoy. Outdoor pur- suits include cycling, horse-riding, shooting, fishing, jogging, golf, foot ball, cricket and camping. At home people are busy with sewing, reading, D.I.Y.jobs or hobbies like collecting stamps and painting. More and more people have computers and videos. As a family we go walking, visiting, swim- ming and out to eat or to the cinema.
{Kevin Morris wrote about Sundays:}I am nine and my family consists of Mum and Dad, Gran'ma, a brother and 2 sisters, one is married. On{Sundays}we relax and do what we enjoy. We have tea in bed. Breakfast is about 9a.m.- cereal, bacon & eggs. In winter Paul plays football. Sometimes he goes for a run whilst I bicycle beside him. (cont)
